alert.note: Alert for Bergen; Passaic (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 09 at 10:04PM EDT until July 11 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in New York...New Jersey... Ramapo River near Mahwah affecting Orange, Passaic, Rockland and Bergen Counties. For the Ramapo River...including Mahwah...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ramapo River Mahwah. * WHEN...From this evening to Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, State Route 202 floods downstream. Moderate flooding along Route 202 and Route 17. Water into backyards. Minor flooding along Brakeshoe Place, Brook Street and Catherine Avenue. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 PM EDT Sunday the stage was 8.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 8.9 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.9 feet on 11/12/1995. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 pm EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Ramapo River Mahwah 8.0 8.0 Sun 9 pm EDT 8.9 7.4 5.8 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 1015 AM EDT.
